overview: Steve Sparks is a sport who's into sports of a other sort. He grabs an early morning jog and ends up in a sexual marathon. Next, Tanner Reeves catchs Adam Rom putting in overtime on himself, then Kyle Richards and Georgio Falconi avoid sunburns together. Brandon Taylor fixes Adam West's engine, and finally, Steve Sparks finds no rest in a park restroom with Dallas Taylor.
title: Top Men
